item.description:
**UPDATE-Don't forget to buy your tickets in advance for $25.  It will be $30 at the door (only if they have any left, this event has sold out in the past).**

I will be arriving early in order for those attending to meet out front.  I look just like my picture.  The group will be meeting out in front of the entrance to the Salem Old Town Hall.  We will wait about five minutes for late arrivals. If you arrive after this time you will have to meet us inside as the event fills up fast.

Celebrate the Return of Spring at our 4th Annual Bacchanalia!  We’ll be kicking off Salem Restaurant Week with a sampling of culinary delights from Salem restaurants, a tasting of fine wine and craft beer, music and art! (Food and wine/beer sampling included in ticket)

You'll meet familiar characters from myth and legend and enjoy the goddesses and nymphs that wander the "Garden of Earthly Delights."
Roman attire is encouraged!! Check out his video from Spring Fling 2010 to see what's in store.

We'll have great craft beer from Magic Hat, Ipswich, Stone Cat, Cape Ann Brewing, Harpoon, Mayflower, Cody Brewing, Left Hand Brewing, Narragansett, Clown Shoes and more! We'll also have a fine selection of wines from around the world from Pamplemousse and Market Wine & Spirits.

Food and desserts will be served by the best Salem restaurants including Finz, Sixty2 on the Wharf, The Lobster Shanty, Victoria Station, The Upper Crust Pizzeria, Café Polonia, Comida, Gulu-Gulu Café and more! Enjoy coffee and desserts from Café Valverde, Ben & Jerry’s and Rita’s.  All attendees will receive a free collectable glass.

Groove to the Beantown funk of Big Ol' Dirty Bucket and their unique blend of Funk, Rock, R&B, Soul, Jam Grooves, Trip Hop, Latin Step, Blues, and Experimental Soundscapes.

We'll also have free chair massages provided by Living Well, readings with The Oracle at Delphi, Kelly Spangler (for an extra fee) and lots of great art from local artists.

Buy tickets online for just $25 until March 20th here: http://salemspringfling.com/tickets.html ; or Tickets are $30.00 on the day of the event.

Tickets may also be purchased in person at these locations:
Pamplemousse at 185 Essex Street, Salem 978-745-2900
Salem Cycle at 72 Washington St, Salem
The Picklepot on Pickering Wharf, Salem
Roost at 40 Front Street, Salem
item.why: This looks like a fun event with lots going on. Kristin has offered to host. :)
item.name: Salem Spring Fling! Attn. Beer, wine, music, art and Roman attire lovers!
